entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19 except minus 23 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 19 except minus 23 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
